Summary: Bright light flying low made no sound. At lake lawtonka was aroun 3-4am
divs: Sighting DetailsSome friends and I were sitting around the camp fire late at night when I saw a bright light coming over MT Scott. I said look a shooting star. But it was going to slow and kept flying toward us. It was a bright white light. It was to low to be a sateillte but it was low enough to be a plane. It made no noise what so ever thought it was slilence though and we watch it fly into the night.
